sql-command.script: SELECT 'change' AS value, 'Cambio' AS name UNION ALL SELECT 'manteinence', 'Mantenimiento' UNION ALL SELECT 'other', 'Otro'

select s.id, s.identificador as identifier, CASE s.estado WHEN 'active' THEN 'ACTIVO' END as status, s.direccion as address, s.direccion as displayName, s.direccion_postal as billingAddress, s.tipo as type, s.debito_automatico as automaticDebit, s.factura_digital as digitalInvoice, s.tarifa_social as socialRate, s.id_cliente as clientId, c.nombre_completo as ownerName from SUMINISTRO s inner join CLIENTE c on s.id_cliente = c.id_cliente where s.id_cliente = :clientId

select s.id, s.identificador as identifier, CASE s.estado WHEN 'active' THEN 'ACTIVO' END as status, s.direccion as address, s.direccion as displayName, s.direccion_postal as billingAddress, s.tipo as type, s.debito_automatico as automaticDebit, s.factura_digital as digitalInvoice, s.tarifa_social as socialRate, s.id_cliente as clientId, s.tipo_debito_automatico as debitType, c.nombre_completo as ownerName from SUMINISTRO s inner join CLIENTE c on s.id_cliente = c.id_cliente where s.identificador = :identifier

select c.nombre_completo as ownerFullname, count(distinct s.identificador) as servicesCount, count(f.suministro) as receiptsCount, count(case when f.vencimiento < curdate() then 1 end) as overdueReceiptsCount, sum(case when pf.importe is null then f.importe else f.importe - pf.importe end) as totalDebt from innova_vo_client.SUMINISTRO s inner join innova_vo_client.CLIENTE c on c.id_cliente = s.id_cliente left join innova_vo_client.FACTURA f on s.identificador = f.suministro left join (select p.nro_factura, sum(p.importe) as importe from innova_vo_client.PAGO p group by p.nro_factura) as pf on f.nro_factura = pf.nro_factura where (f.tipo is null or f.tipo = 'Factura') and s.identificador in (:identifiers) group by c.nombre_completo
update SUMINISTRO set debito_automatico = 1, tipo_debito_automatico = (:debitType) where identificador in (:identifiers)
update SUMINISTRO set debito_automatico = 0 where identificador in (:identifiers)
update SUMINISTRO set factura_digital = 1 where identificador in (:identifiers)
update SUMINISTRO set factura_digital = 0 where identificador in (:identifiers)
update SUMINISTRO set factura_digital = 0 where identificador in (:identifiers)
